impositionOffenceDetails.details:
FO - Fine
Fined £200.00
PDATE - Pay by date
Pay by date. Date to pay in full by: 12/12/2025.ACON - Account Consolidated
Account to be consolidated with existing accounts. 
FIDICI - Fined and detained in default of payment until court rises
To be detained in the courthouse until the court rises. Total amount enforced £50.00.
impositionOffenceDetails.title: Robbery
